name: Neural Motivator
description: During the Status Phase, draw 2 action cards instead of 1.

name: Psychoarchaeology
description: You can use technology specialties on planets you control without exhausting them to satisfy prerequisites. After you explore a planet, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

name: Dacxive Animators
description: After you win a ground combat, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

name: Bio-Stims
description: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to ready 1 of your other technologies.

name: Hyper Metabolism
description: During the Status Phase, gain 3 command tokens instead of 2.

name: X-89 Bacterial Weapon
description: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose 1 planet in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships that have BOMBARDMENT; destroy all infantry on that planet.

name: Plasma Scoring
description: When 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT or SPACE CANNON, 1 of those units may roll 1 additional die.

name: AI Development Algorithm
description: When you research a unit upgrade technology, you may exhaust this card to ignore any 1 prerequisite on that technology.

name: Magen Defense Grid
description: At the start of ground combat on a planet that contains 1 or more of your structures, you may produce 1 hit against your opponent's ground forces on that planet.

name: Self Assembly Routines
description: After a player gains control of a planet, you may exhaust this card to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on that planet.

name: Duranium Armor
description: During each combat round, after you assign hits to your units, repair 1 of your damaged units that did not just sustain damage during this combat round.

name: Assault Cannon
description: At the start of a round of space combat in a system that contains 3 or more of your non-fighter ships, you may destroy 1 of your opponent's non-fighter ships.

name: Antimass Deflectors
description: Your ships can move into and through systems that contain anomalies. When other players' units use SPACE CANNON against your units, apply -1 to each die roll.

name: Dark Energy Tap
description: After you perform a tactical action in a system that contains a frontier token, if you have 1 or more ships in that system, explore that frontier token.

name: Gravity Drive
description: After you activate a system, apply +1 to the move value of 1 of your ships during this tactical action.

name: Sling Relay
description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to produce 1 ship in any system that contains one of your space docks.

name: Fleet Logistics
description: During each of your turns of the Action Phase, you may perform 2 actions instead of 1.

name: Light/Wave Deflector
description: Your ships can move through systems that contain other players' ships.

name: Sarween Tools
description: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1.

name: Scanlink Drone Network
description: When you activate a system, you may explore 1 planet in that system that contains 1 or more of your units.

name: Graviton Laser System
description: You may exhaust this card before 1 or more of your units use SPACE CANNON; hits produced by those units must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

name: Predictive Intelligence
description: At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to redistribute your command tokens.

name: Transit Diodes
description: You may exhaust this card at the start of your turn during the Action Phase to place up to 4 infantry from your reinforcements on 1 or more planets you control.

name: Integrated Economy
description: After you gain control of a planet, you may produce any number of units on that planet, spending resources as normal.

name: Carrier II
description: Improved carrier with SUSTAIN DAMAGE. Cost 3, Move 2, Capacity 6.

name: Cruiser II
description: Improved cruiser with increased combat and capacity. Cost 2, Move 3, Combat 6, Capacity 1.

name: Destroyer II
description: Improved destroyer with enhanced ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE. Cost 1, Move 2, Combat 8, AFB 6 (x3).

name: Dreadnought II
description: Improved dreadnought with increased movement. Cost 4, Move 2, Combat 5, Capacity 1, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 5.

name: Fighter II
description: Improved fighter that can move independently. Cost 1 (x2), Move 2, Combat 8.

name: Infantry II
description: Improved infantry with better combat value. Cost 1 (x2), Combat 7.

name: PDS II
description: Improved PDS with SPACE CANNON OFFENSE and increased range. SPACE CANNON 5, can fire into adjacent systems.

name: Space Dock II
description: Improved space dock with increased production. PRODUCTION 4.

name: War Sun
description: Allows production of war suns. Cost 12, Move 2, Combat 3 (x3), Capacity 6, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3 (x3).

name: Bioplasmosis
description: At the end of the Status Phase, you may remove any number of infantry from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems.

name: Letani Warrior II
description: After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on your faction sheet. At the start of your next turn, place each unit on your faction sheet on a planet you control in your home system.

name: L4 Disruptors
description: During an invasion in a system that contains your units, your opponent cannot use SPACE CANNON against your units.

name: Non-Euclidean Shielding
description: When 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, cancel 2 hits instead of 1.

name: Chaos Mapping
description: Other players cannot activate asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your ships. At the start of your turn, you may produce 1 unit in a system that contains your space docks.

name: Floating Factory II
description: Improved floating factory. PRODUCTION 5, Move 1, Capacity 5. This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet.

name: Magmus Reactor
description: Your ships can move into supernova systems. After 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, you may produce 1 infantry in that system's space area or on a planet in that system.

name: Prototype War Sun II
description: Improved war sun. Cost 10, Move 3, Combat 3 (x3), Capacity 6, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3 (x3).

name: Production Biomes
description: ACTION: Exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool to gain 4 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods.

name: Quantum Datahub Node
description: At the end of the Strategy Phase, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool to swap 1 of your strategy cards with 1 of another player's strategy cards.

name: Advanced Carrier II
description: Improved carrier. Cost 3, Move 2, Capacity 8, SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

name: Spec Ops II
description: Improved infantry. Cost 1 (x2), Combat 6. After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 5 or greater, place the unit on your faction sheet to be deployed later.

name: Dimensional Splicer
description: At the start of a space combat in a system that contains a wormhole and 1 or more of your ships, you may produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships.

name: Wormhole Generator
description: At the start of the Status Phase, place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

name: Inheritance Systems
description: You may exhaust this card and spend 2 resources when you research a technology; ignore all of that technology's prerequisites.

name: Super Dreadnought II
description: Improved dreadnought. Cost 4, Move 2, Combat 4, Capacity 2, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 4.

name: Mirror Computing
description: When you spend trade goods, each trade good is worth 2 resources or 2 influence instead of 1.

name: Salvage Operations
description: After you win or lose a space combat, gain 1 trade good; if you won, you may also produce 1 ship in that system of any ship type that was destroyed during the combat.

name: Neuroglaive
description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, that player removes 1 token from their fleet pool and places it in their reinforcements.

name: Hybrid Crystal Fighter II
description: Improved fighter. Cost 1 (x2), Move 2, Combat 7. This unit may move without being transported.

name: Valefar Assimilator X
description: When you would gain a technology, you may instead place this card on a non-faction technology owned by another player; you now have that technology.

name: Valefar Assimilator Y
description: When you would gain a technology, you may instead place this card on a non-faction technology owned by another player; you now have that technology.

name: Exotrireme II
description: Improved dreadnought. Cost 4, Move 2, Combat 4, Capacity 1, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 4. After a round of space combat, you may destroy this unit to destroy up to 2 of your opponent's ships.

name: Valkyrie Particle Weave
description: After making combat rolls during a round of ground combat, if your opponent produced 1 or more hits, you produce 1 additional hit.

name: E-Res Siphons
description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, gain 4 trade goods.

name: Spacial Conduit Cylinder
description: You may exhaust this card after you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your units; that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain 1 or more of your units during this tactical action.

name: Hegemonic Trade Policy
description: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the resource and influence values of 1 planet you control for this use of PRODUCTION.

name: Lazax Gate Folding
description: During your tactical actions, if you do not control Mecatol Rex, treat Mecatol Rex's system as if it contained both an alpha and beta wormhole. ACTION: If you control Mecatol Rex, exhaust this card to place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

name: Instinct Training
description: You may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool when another player plays an action card; cancel that action card.

name: Nullification Field
description: After another player activates a system that is adjacent to 1 or more of your systems that contain your ships, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool; return the command token of the activating player and they cannot activate that system this turn.

name: Impulse Core
description: At the start of a space combat, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships; that hit must be assigned to a non-fighter ship if able.

name: Yin Spinner
description: After you produce 1 or more units, place up to 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

name: Mageon Implants
description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to look at another player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand.

name: Transparasteel Plating
description: During your turn of the Action Phase, players that have passed cannot play action cards.

name: Aerie Hololattice
description: Other players cannot use ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE against your units. After you win a space combat, place up to 2 fighters from your reinforcements in that system.

name: Strike Wing Alpha II
description: Improved destroyer. Cost 1, Move 2, Combat 7, Capacity 1, AFB 6 (x3). This unit may transport 1 infantry or 1 mech.

name: Dark Veil
description: After you activate a system, you may spend 1 strategy token. If so, other players cannot see the ships you have in that system until combat begins.

name: Aetherstream
description: Your units may move through systems that contain other players' ships and treat those systems as if they contained no anomalies.

name: Genetic Recombination
description: You may exhaust this card before a player casts votes. That player must cast at least 1 vote for an outcome of your choice or abstain.

name: Crimson Legionnaire II
description: Improved infantry. Cost 1 (x2), Combat 6. After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.

name: Pre-Fab Arcologies
description: After you explore a planet, you may place 1 mech from your reinforcements on that planet.

name: Supercharge
description: At the start of a combat round, you may apply +1 to the result of each of your combat rolls during that round for each of your mechs in the combat.

name: Temporal Command Suite
description: After any player's agent is exhausted, you may exhaust 1 of your agents to resolve that agent's ability as if it were your own.

name: Memoria II
description: Improved flagship. Cost 8, Move 2, Combat 5, Capacity 6, SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

name: Saturn Engine II
description: Improved cruiser. Cost 2, Move 3, Combat 6, Capacity 1, SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

name: Hel-Titan II
description: Improved PDS with ground combat capability. Combat 6, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, SPACE CANNON 5, PRODUCTION 1.

name: Dimensional Tear II
description: Improved flagship. Cost 8, Move 1, Combat 5 (x2), Capacity 3, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 5. Units destroyed by this unit are captured.

name: Vortex
description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to choose another player's non-structure unit in a system that is adjacent to 1 or more of your units that have DIMENSIONAL TEAR; capture that unit.

name: IIHQ Modernization
description: You are neighbors with all other players. Your ships can move through systems that contain other players' ships.

name: Agency Supply Network
description: Whenever any player replenishes commodities, you may gain 1 trade good.
